title: Deliveries: A Collection
description: In this diverse and darkly entertaining collection, Richard Yee delivers fourteen brilliant short stories ranging from crime drama to science fiction... A wandering spirit scours the universe in search of a lost identity...a time traveler avenges the death of his sister...a successful writer starts seeing his characters in real life...a weary police detective investigates the murder of a teenage girl...a professional hit man is ordered to kill his estranged father...a monumental discovery by mankind leads to its ultimate destruction... These "deliveries" and more will move you, frighten you, and make you think.
author: Richard Yee
